title: That Council approve the recommendation outlined in Report IPSACP23-013, dated May 1, 2023, of the Commissioner of Infrastructure and Planning Services as follows: That $612,500.00, plus HST, be added to the Capital Budget for the Chemong West/Towerhill Sanitary Sewer project.
23-057 - Being a by-law to confirm the proceedings of Council at its special meeting held on May 8, 2023.
That this meeting adjourn at 5:55 p.m.
